document.full_text: transcanada corp's 591,000 barrel-per-day (bpd) capacity keystone pipeline resumed shipping crude oil, one week after being shut by a leak at a kansas pumping station, the calgary-based company said in a statement.
document.title: transcanada says keystone resumes shipping crude oil
lines_and_colors: transcanada corp's 591,000 barrel-per-day (bpd) capacity keystone pipeline resumed shipping crude oil, one week after being shut by a leak at a kansas pumping station, the calgary-based company said in a statement.
